extends UnbundledVideo
    A class that holds an offline video

      • getVideo

        public static OfflineVideo getVideo(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.io.File folder,
                                    com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.cache.Cache cache,
                                    java.lang.String embedCode)
        Create a DASH video object for offline playback.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to retrieve the shared preference.
        folder - The folder that holds offline video.
        cache - The Cache that holds offline video.
        embedCode - The current item embed code.
        Returns:
        An OfflineVideo object on success, null otherwise.
